#summary Features of The Render Engine.

= Introduction =

Below is a list of what is currently supported in The Render Engine.  See the ReleaseMilestones and FutureGoals page for info on what's up and coming!

  # Completely open-source engine
  # Script loading w/ Dependency processor (linker)
  # Multiple browser support
    * Firefox 1.5+
    * Safari 3.0+
    * Opera 9.5+
    * Chrome b3+
  # 2D Vector-based example game (Asteroids clone)
  # Canvas rendering context
  # Modular host objects
  # Multiple components
    * Transformation
    * Collision
    * Input (keyboard, mouse)
    * Logic 
    * Rendering (Canvas, DOM)
  # 2D Sprite support
  # Sound support
  # Resource loaders
    * JSON Object
    * XML
    * Sound
    * Image
    * Sprite (animated & static)
    * Bitmapped font
  # Ant build script
  # Multiple platforms
    * Windows
    * Macintosh
    * Linux
    * iPhone
    * Wii
